column1: switched off the lights, the intruders have then separated the deceased and
the  two women, made them to sit and tied  them with strips of fabric  torn

off  a  curtain.  Thereafter, 
two  of 
the 
intruders  have 
ransacked 
their

almirahs and removed any valuable items 
they could lay  their hands on.

They also 
took  personal jewellery items worn by  the two witnesses. The
deceased  pleaded  with  the  intruders  to  take  what  they  want  and  leave
them without causing any bodily harm.
